title: Thanks for the bots
body:
-2 more wins for promos
-be rito
-gives 8 bot accounts

If they aren't bots, then somethings SERIOUSLY wrong with the players. 
0 help if ganking
"Why did we lose"
focuses tank and lets carries beat into them
"why did we lose"
0 ganks if not jg
'why did we lose"

Seriously rito, fix your matching making, giving me iron in promos for gold is beyond fair. 
Giving me these "players" is unbelievably unbalanced. 

And I swear to god, if i get another emi or rep saying nothing wrong with it, it means you're employing people or giving hand outs to people who dont play.
